toys.name: Dog Chew Toy
toys.description: This durable chew toy is perfect for dogs who love to chew. It helps promote dental health and provides hours of entertainment.

toys.name: Interactive Cat Toy
toys.description: Keep your cat entertained with this interactive toy. It features feathers and a dangling ball to stimulate their natural hunting instincts.

toys.name: Plush Bear Toy
toys.description: This soft and cuddly bear toy is perfect for snuggling. It's made of high-quality materials and is safe for children of all ages.

toys.name: Squeaky Dog Toy
toys.description: This squeaky dog toy will keep your pup entertained. It's made of non-toxic materials and is suitable for small to medium-sized dogs.

toys.name: Catnip Mouse Toy
toys.description: Entice your cat with this catnip-filled mouse toy. It's lightweight and perfect for batting and pouncing.

toys.name: Stuffed Bear Pillow
toys.description: This oversized stuffed bear pillow is a great addition to any child's room. It's soft, huggable, and makes a perfect cuddle buddy.

toys.name: Treat Dispensing Dog Toy
toys.description: Challenge your dog's mind with this treat-dispensing toy. Fill it with your dog's favorite treats and watch them work to retrieve them.

toys.name: Feather Teaser Wand
toys.description: Engage your cat in interactive play with this feather teaser wand. It's designed to mimic the movement of prey and will keep your cat entertained for hours.

toys.name: Talking Bear Plush Toy
toys.description: This talking bear plush toy will delight children with its cute phrases and cuddly nature. It's the perfect companion for bedtime or playtime.

toys.name: Rope Tug Toy
toys.description: Play a game of tug-of-war with your dog using this durable rope toy. It's great for strengthening your dog's teeth and gums.

toys.name: Cat Tower with Scratchers
toys.description: Give your cat a place to play, scratch, and relax with this multi-level cat tower. It features built-in scratchers and cozy resting spots.

toys.name: Musical Bear Plush Toy
toys.description: This musical bear plush toy plays soothing melodies to help lull your child to sleep. It's soft, cuddly, and provides a comforting presence.
